Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/ King Drive
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses rerouted EB via 79th, State, 76th, Cottage Grove & 79th; WB via 79th, Cottage Grv, 83rd, State & 79th due to street blockage near 79th/ King Drive

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions in both directions due to street blockage near 79th/ King Drive.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, State, 76th, Cottage Grove & 79th
  • Westbound buses will operate via 79th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, State & 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Western
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California and Montrose due to a street blockage near Montrose/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California and Montrose due to a street blockage near Montrose/Western.

Allow extra travel time.
